description: Manage artifact streaming for any repositories or supported images in an ACR.

commands.name: az acr artifact-streaming create
commands.summary: Create a referrers streaming artifact for a specific image in an ACR.
examples: az acr artifact-streaming create -n myregistry -t MyImage

commands.name: az acr artifact-streaming show
commands.summary: Show if artifact streaming is enabled in a repository for an Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr artifact-streaming show -n myregistry --repository MyRepo

commands.name: az acr artifact-streaming update
commands.summary: Enable or disable auto-creation of streaming artifacts for newly pushed images under a given registry.
examples: az acr artifact-streaming update -n myregistry --repository MyRepository --enable-streaming True
az acr artifact-streaming update -n myregistry --repository MyRepository --enable-streaming False
